item.title: H5 Spine Animation Runtime Library
item.description: H5 Spine Animation Runtime Library Description The runtime library version should match the version of Spine Running Spine 3.8 with PIXI version 5 and pixi-spine 2.1.14 Installing Pixi V5 1 npm i pixi.js@5.3.11 Installation of Pixi-Spine 1 npm i pixi-spine@2.1.14 Import Import pixi.js 1 import * as PIXI from "pixi.
